entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
